fields.name: OSCNT
fields.description: Oscillator ready counter value. These bits define value of 32KHz counter, that serve as counter for oscillator lock time (count to n+1 ckil's). This is used for oscillator lock time. Current estimation is ~5ms. This counter will be used in ignition sequence and in wake from stop sequence if sbyos bit was defined, to notify that on chip oscillator output is ready for the dpll_ip to use and only then the gate in dpll_ip can be opened.

fields.name: COSC_EN
fields.description: On chip oscillator enable bit - this bit value is reflected on the output cosc_en

fields.name: REG_BYPASS_COUNT
fields.description: Counter for analog_reg_bypass signal assertion after standby voltage request by PMIC_STBY_REQ

fields.name: REF_EN_B
fields.description: Status of the value of CCM_REF_EN_B output of ccm

fields.name: COSC_READY
fields.description: Status indication of on board oscillator

enumeratedValues.name: COSC_READY_0
enumeratedValues.description: on board oscillator is not ready.

fields.name: PLL3_SW_CLK_SEL
fields.description: Selects source to generate pll3_sw_clk. This bit should only be used for testing purposes.

enumeratedValues.name: SEMC_CLK_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: Periph_clk output will be used as SEMC clock root

enumeratedValues.name: SEMC_CLK_SEL_1
enumeratedValues.description: SEMC alternative clock will be used as SEMC clock root

enumeratedValues.name: SEMC_ALT_CLK_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: PLL2 PFD2 will be selected as alternative clock for SEMC root clock

enumeratedValues.name: SEMC_ALT_CLK_SEL_1
enumeratedValues.description: PLL3 PFD1 will be selected as alternative clock for SEMC root clock

enumeratedValues.name: LPSPI_CLK_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: derive clock from PLL3 PFD1 clk

fields.name: PERIPH_CLK2_SEL
fields.description: Selector for peripheral clk2 clock multiplexer

fields.name: LPSPI_PODF
fields.description: Divider for LPSPI. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: PERCLK_CLK_SEL
fields.description: Selector for the perclk clock multiplexor

enumeratedValues.name: PERCLK_CLK_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: derive clock from ipg clk root

enumeratedValues.name: CAN_CLK_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: derive clock from pll3_sw_clk divided clock (60M)

enumeratedValues.name: CAN_CLK_SEL_2
enumeratedValues.description: derive clock from pll3_sw_clk divided clock (80M)

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXIO2_CLK_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: derive clock from PLL4 divided clock

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXIO2_CLK_SEL_1
enumeratedValues.description: derive clock from PLL3 PFD2 clock

fields.name: UART_CLK_SEL
fields.description: Selector for the UART clock multiplexor

fields.name: USDHC1_PODF
fields.description: Divider for usdhc1 clock podf. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: USDHC2_PODF
fields.description: Divider for usdhc2 clock. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: TRACE_PODF
fields.description: Divider for trace clock. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: SAI1_CLK_PODF
fields.description: Divider for sai1 clock podf. The input clock to this divider should be lower than 300Mhz, the predivider can be used to achieve this.

fields.name: SAI3_CLK_PODF
fields.description: Divider for sai3 clock podf. The input clock to this divider should be lower than 300Mhz, the predivider can be used to achieve this.

fields.name: FLEXIO2_CLK_PODF
fields.description: Divider for flexio2/flexio3 clock. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: SAI2_CLK_PODF
fields.description: Divider for sai2 clock podf. The input clock to this divider should be lower than 300Mhz, the predivider can be used to achieve this.

fields.name: SAI2_CLK_PRED
fields.description: Divider for sai2 clock pred.Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: FLEXIO1_CLK_PODF
fields.description: Divider for flexio1 clock podf. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: FLEXIO1_CLK_PRED
fields.description: Divider for flexio1 clock pred. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: SPDIF0_CLK_PODF
fields.description: Divider for spdif0 clock podf. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: SPDIF0_CLK_PRED
fields.description: Divider for spdif0 clock pred. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: LCDIF_PRED
fields.description: Pre-divider for lcdif clock. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

fields.name: LCDIF_PRE_CLK_SEL
fields.description: Selector for lcdif root clock pre-multiplexer

fields.name: LPI2C_CLK_SEL
fields.description: Selector for the LPI2C clock multiplexor

fields.name: LPI2C_CLK_PODF
fields.description: Divider for lpi2c clock podf. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated. The input clock to this divider should be lower than 300Mhz, the predivider can be used to achieve this.

fields.name: CSI_PODF
fields.description: Post divider for csi_mclk. Divider should be updated when output clock is gated.

enumeratedValues.name: SEMC_PODF_BUSY_0
enumeratedValues.description: divider is not busy and its value represents the actual division.

enumeratedValues.name: SEMC_PODF_BUSY_1
enumeratedValues.description: divider is busy with handshake process with module. The value read in the divider represents the previous value of the division factor, and after the handshake the written value of the semc_podf will be applied.

enumeratedValues.name: AHB_PODF_BUSY_0
enumeratedValues.description: divider is not busy and its value represents the actual division.

enumeratedValues.name: AHB_PODF_BUSY_1
enumeratedValues.description: divider is busy with handshake process with module. The value read in the divider represents the previous value of the division factor, and after the handshake the written value of the ahb_podf will be applied.

fields.name: PERIPH2_CLK_SEL_BUSY
fields.description: Busy indicator for periph2_clk_sel mux control.

enumeratedValues.name: PERIPH2_CLK_SEL_BUSY_0
enumeratedValues.description: mux is not busy and its value represents the actual division.

enumeratedValues.name: PERIPH2_CLK_SEL_BUSY_1
enumeratedValues.description: mux is busy with handshake process with module. The value read in the periph2_clk_sel represents the previous value of select, and after the handshake periph2_clk_sel value will be applied.

fields.name: PERIPH_CLK_SEL_BUSY
fields.description: Busy indicator for periph_clk_sel mux control.

enumeratedValues.name: PERIPH_CLK_SEL_BUSY_0
enumeratedValues.description: mux is not busy and its value represents the actual division.

enumeratedValues.name: PERIPH_CLK_SEL_BUSY_1
enumeratedValues.description: mux is busy with handshake process with module. The value read in the periph_clk_sel represents the previous value of select, and after the handshake periph_clk_sel value will be applied.

enumeratedValues.name: ARM_PODF_BUSY_0
enumeratedValues.description: divider is not busy and its value represents the actual division.

enumeratedValues.name: ARM_PODF_BUSY_1
enumeratedValues.description: divider is busy with handshake process with module. The value read in the divider represents the previous value of the division factor, and after the handshake the written value of the arm_podf will be applied.

fields.name: LPM
fields.description: Setting the low power mode that system will enter on next assertion of dsm_request signal.

fields.name: ARM_CLK_DIS_ON_LPM
fields.description: Define if Arm clocks (arm_clk, soc_mxclk, soc_pclk, soc_dbg_pclk, vl_wrck) will be disabled on wait mode

enumeratedValues.name: ARM_CLK_DIS_ON_LPM_0
enumeratedValues.description: Arm clock enabled on wait mode.

enumeratedValues.name: ARM_CLK_DIS_ON_LPM_1
enumeratedValues.description: Arm clock disabled on wait mode. .

enumeratedValues.name: SBYOS_0
enumeratedValues.description: On-chip oscillator will not be powered down, after next entrance to STOP mode. (CCM_REF_EN_B will remain asserted - '0' and cosc_pwrdown will remain de asserted - '0')

enumeratedValues.name: SBYOS_1
enumeratedValues.description: On-chip oscillator will be powered down, after next entrance to STOP mode. (CCM_REF_EN_B will be deasserted - '1' and cosc_pwrdown will be asserted - '1'). When returning from STOP mode, external oscillator will be enabled again, on-chip oscillator will return to oscillator mode, and after oscnt count, CCM will continue with the exit from the STOP mode process.

fields.name: DIS_REF_OSC
fields.description: dis_ref_osc - in run mode, software can manually control closing of external reference oscillator clock, i

enumeratedValues.name: DIS_REF_OSC_0
enumeratedValues.description: external high frequency oscillator will be enabled, i.e. CCM_REF_EN_B = '0'.

enumeratedValues.name: DIS_REF_OSC_1
enumeratedValues.description: external high frequency oscillator will be disabled, i.e. CCM_REF_EN_B = '1'

enumeratedValues.name: VSTBY_0
enumeratedValues.description: Voltage will not be changed to standby voltage after next entrance to STOP mode. ( PMIC_STBY_REQ will remain negated - '0')

enumeratedValues.name: VSTBY_1
enumeratedValues.description: Voltage will be requested to change to standby voltage after next entrance to stop mode. ( PMIC_STBY_REQ will be asserted - '1').

enumeratedValues.name: STBY_COUNT_0
enumeratedValues.description: CCM will wait (1*pmic_delay_scaler)+1 ckil clock cycles

enumeratedValues.name: STBY_COUNT_1
enumeratedValues.description: CCM will wait (3*pmic_delay_scaler)+1 ckil clock cycles

enumeratedValues.name: STBY_COUNT_2
enumeratedValues.description: CCM will wait (7*pmic_delay_scaler)+1 ckil clock cycles

enumeratedValues.name: STBY_COUNT_3
enumeratedValues.description: CCM will wait (15*pmic_delay_scaler)+1 ckil clock cycles

fields.name: COSC_PWRDOWN
fields.description: In run mode, software can manually control powering down of on chip oscillator, i

enumeratedValues.name: COSC_PWRDOWN_0
enumeratedValues.description: On chip oscillator will not be powered down, i.e. cosc_pwrdown = '0'.

enumeratedValues.name: COSC_PWRDOWN_1
enumeratedValues.description: On chip oscillator will be powered down, i.e. cosc_pwrdown = '1'.

fields.name: BYPASS_LPM_HS1
fields.description: Bypass low power mode handshake. This bit should always be set to 1'b1 by software.

fields.name: BYPASS_LPM_HS0
fields.description: Bypass low power mode handshake. This bit should always be set to 1'b1 by software.

fields.name: MASK_CORE0_WFI
fields.description: Mask WFI of core0 for entering low power mode Assertion of all bits[27:22] will generate low power mode request

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_CORE0_WFI_0
enumeratedValues.description: WFI of core0 is not masked

fields.name: MASK_SCU_IDLE
fields.description: Mask SCU IDLE for entering low power mode Assertion of all bits[27:22] will generate low power mode request

fields.name: MASK_L2CC_IDLE
fields.description: Mask L2CC IDLE for entering low power mode

fields.name: LRF_PLL
fields.description: CCM interrupt request 2 generated due to lock of all enabled and not bypaseed PLLs

enumeratedValues.name: LRF_PLL_0
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt is not generated due to lock ready of all enabled and not bypaseed PLLs

enumeratedValues.name: LRF_PLL_1
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt generated due to lock ready of all enabled and not bypaseed PLLs

fields.name: COSC_READY
fields.description: CCM interrupt request 2 generated due to on board oscillator ready, i

enumeratedValues.name: COSC_READY_0
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt is not generated due to on board oscillator ready

enumeratedValues.name: COSC_READY_1
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt generated due to on board oscillator ready

fields.name: SEMC_PODF_LOADED
fields.description: CCM interrupt request 1 generated due to frequency change of semc_podf

enumeratedValues.name: SEMC_PODF_LOADED_0
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt is not generated due to frequency change of semc_podf

enumeratedValues.name: SEMC_PODF_LOADED_1
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt generated due to frequency change of semc_podf

fields.name: PERIPH2_CLK_SEL_LOADED
fields.description: CCM interrupt request 1 generated due to frequency change of periph2_clk_sel

enumeratedValues.name: PERIPH2_CLK_SEL_LOADED_0
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt is not generated due to frequency change of periph2_clk_sel

enumeratedValues.name: PERIPH2_CLK_SEL_LOADED_1
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt generated due to frequency change of periph2_clk_sel

fields.name: AHB_PODF_LOADED
fields.description: CCM interrupt request 1 generated due to frequency change of ahb_podf

enumeratedValues.name: AHB_PODF_LOADED_0
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt is not generated due to frequency change of ahb_podf

enumeratedValues.name: AHB_PODF_LOADED_1
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt generated due to frequency change of ahb_podf

fields.name: PERIPH_CLK_SEL_LOADED
fields.description: CCM interrupt request 1 generated due to update of periph_clk_sel.

enumeratedValues.name: PERIPH_CLK_SEL_LOADED_0
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt is not generated due to update of periph_clk_sel.

enumeratedValues.name: PERIPH_CLK_SEL_LOADED_1
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt generated due to update of periph_clk_sel.

fields.name: ARM_PODF_LOADED
fields.description: CCM interrupt request 1 generated due to frequency change of arm_podf

enumeratedValues.name: ARM_PODF_LOADED_0
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt is not generated due to frequency change of arm_podf

enumeratedValues.name: ARM_PODF_LOADED_1
enumeratedValues.description: interrupt generated due to frequency change of arm_podf

fields.name: MASK_LRF_PLL
fields.description: mask interrupt generation due to lrf of PLLs

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_LRF_PLL_0
enumeratedValues.description: don't mask interrupt due to lrf of PLLs - interrupt will be created

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_LRF_PLL_1
enumeratedValues.description: mask interrupt due to lrf of PLLs

fields.name: MASK_COSC_READY
fields.description: mask interrupt generation due to on board oscillator ready

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_COSC_READY_0
enumeratedValues.description: don't mask interrupt due to on board oscillator ready - interrupt will be created

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_COSC_READY_1
enumeratedValues.description: mask interrupt due to on board oscillator ready

fields.name: MASK_SEMC_PODF_LOADED
fields.description: mask interrupt generation due to frequency change of semc_podf

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_SEMC_PODF_LOADED_0
enumeratedValues.description: don't mask interrupt due to frequency change of semc_podf - interrupt will be created

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_SEMC_PODF_LOADED_1
enumeratedValues.description: mask interrupt due to frequency change of semc_podf

fields.name: MASK_PERIPH2_CLK_SEL_LOADED
fields.description: mask interrupt generation due to update of periph2_clk_sel.

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_PERIPH2_CLK_SEL_LOADED_0
enumeratedValues.description: don't mask interrupt due to update of periph2_clk_sel - interrupt will be created

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_PERIPH2_CLK_SEL_LOADED_1
enumeratedValues.description: mask interrupt due to update of periph2_clk_sel

fields.name: MASK_AHB_PODF_LOADED
fields.description: mask interrupt generation due to frequency change of ahb_podf

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_AHB_PODF_LOADED_0
enumeratedValues.description: don't mask interrupt due to frequency change of ahb_podf - interrupt will be created

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_AHB_PODF_LOADED_1
enumeratedValues.description: mask interrupt due to frequency change of ahb_podf

fields.name: MASK_PERIPH_CLK_SEL_LOADED
fields.description: mask interrupt generation due to update of periph_clk_sel.

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_PERIPH_CLK_SEL_LOADED_0
enumeratedValues.description: don't mask interrupt due to update of periph_clk_sel - interrupt will be created

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_PERIPH_CLK_SEL_LOADED_1
enumeratedValues.description: mask interrupt due to update of periph_clk_sel

fields.name: ARM_PODF_LOADED
fields.description: mask interrupt generation due to frequency change of arm_podf

enumeratedValues.name: ARM_PODF_LOADED_0
enumeratedValues.description: don't mask interrupt due to frequency change of arm_podf - interrupt will be created

enumeratedValues.name: ARM_PODF_LOADED_1
enumeratedValues.description: mask interrupt due to frequency change of arm_podf

fields.name: CLKO1_SEL
fields.description: Selection of the clock to be generated on CCM_CLKO1

fields.name: CLK_OUT_SEL
fields.description: CCM_CLKO1 output to reflect CCM_CLKO1 or CCM_CLKO2 clocks

fields.name: CLKO2_SEL
fields.description: Selection of the clock to be generated on CCM_CLKO2

enumeratedValues.name: CLKO2_SEL_20
enumeratedValues.description: sai3_clk_root (shared with ADC1 and ADC2 alt_clk root)

fields.name: PMIC_DELAY_SCALER
fields.description: Defines clock dividion of clock for stby_count (pmic delay counter)

fields.name: EFUSE_PROG_SUPPLY_GATE
fields.description: Defines the value of the output signal cgpr_dout[4]. Gate of program supply for efuse programing

enumeratedValues.name: EFUSE_PROG_SUPPLY_GATE_0
enumeratedValues.description: fuse programing supply voltage is gated off to the efuse module

enumeratedValues.name: SYS_MEM_DS_CTRL_1
enumeratedValues.description: Enable memory (outside Arm platform) DS mode when system STOP and PLL are disabled

enumeratedValues.name: SYS_MEM_DS_CTRL_2
enumeratedValues.description: enable memory (outside Arm platform) DS mode when system is in STOP mode

enumeratedValues.name: FPL_1
enumeratedValues.description: Engage PLL enable 3 CKIL clocks earlier at exiting low power mode (STOP). Should be used only if 24MHz OSC was active in low power mode.

fields.name: INT_MEM_CLK_LPM
fields.description: Control for the Deep Sleep signal to the Arm Platform memories with additional control logic based on the Arm WFI signal

enumeratedValues.name: INT_MEM_CLK_LPM_0
enumeratedValues.description: Disable the clock to the Arm platform memories when entering Low Power Mode

enumeratedValues.name: INT_MEM_CLK_LPM_1
enumeratedValues.description: Keep the clocks to the Arm platform memories enabled only if an interrupt is pending when entering Low Power Modes (WAIT and STOP without power gating)

fields.name: CG4
fields.description: sim_m or sim_main register access clock (sim_m_mainclk_r_enable)

fields.name: CG14
fields.description: The OCRAM clock cannot be turned off when the CM cache is running on this device.

fields.name: CG5
fields.description: flexspi clocks (flexspi_clk_enable) sim_ems_clk_enable must also be cleared, when flexspi_clk_enable is cleared

fields.name: MOD_EN_OV_GPT
fields.description: Overide clock enable signal from GPT - clock will not be gated based on GPT's signal 'ipg_enable_clk'

fields.name: MOD_EN_OV_PIT
fields.description: Overide clock enable signal from PIT - clock will not be gated based on PIT's signal 'ipg_enable_clk'

fields.name: MOD_EN_USDHC
fields.description: overide clock enable signal from USDHC.

fields.name: MOD_EN_OV_TRNG
fields.description: Overide clock enable signal from TRNG

fields.name: MOD_EN_OV_CANFD_CPI
fields.description: Overide clock enable signal from FlexCAN3(CANFD) - clock will not be gated based on CAN's signal 'enable_clk_cpi'

fields.name: MOD_EN_OV_CAN2_CPI
fields.description: Overide clock enable signal from CAN2 - clock will not be gated based on CAN's signal 'enable_clk_cpi'

fields.name: MOD_EN_OV_CAN1_CPI
fields.description: Overide clock enable signal from CAN1 - clock will not be gated based on CAN's signal 'enable_clk_cpi'
